actor_awards.notes: Best known for her sharp wit and deadpan delivery, often playing the comedic best friend. She received an Academy Award nomination for Mildred Pierce and won a Primetime Emmy for her title role in the series Our Miss Brooks. She has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, one for radio and one for television.

filmography.title: Mildred Pierce
filmography.role_description: The wisecracking, loyal best friend and business partner of the title character.
filmography.plot: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

filmography.title: Grease
filmography.role_description: The stern but flustered principal of Rydell High School who makes the daily announcements.
filmography.plot: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?
filmography.awards: People's Choice Award: Win – Favorite Motion Picture

filmography.title: Anatomy of a Murder
filmography.role_description: The sardonic, loyal secretary to defense attorney Paul Biegler.
filmography.plot: A small-town lawyer takes on the defense of a lieutenant accused of murdering the bartender who raped his wife.

filmography.title: Stage Door
filmography.role_description: A wisecracking aspiring actress living in a theatrical boarding house. Arden's breakthrough film role.
filmography.plot: A boardinghouse for aspiring actresses houses a mix of personalities, all hoping for their big break on Broadway.

filmography.title: Cover Girl
filmography.role_description: The sharp-tongued assistant to a magazine publisher who helps find the new cover girl.
filmography.plot: A nightclub dancer wins a contest to become a cover girl, complicating her relationship with her boyfriend and manager.

filmography.title: Ziegfeld Girl
filmography.role_description: An experienced showgirl who befriends the newcomers trying to make it in the Ziegfeld Follies.
filmography.plot: Three women try to find fame and fortune by joining the Ziegfeld Follies, facing the highs and lows of show business.

filmography.title: At the Circus
filmography.role_description: An acrobat who walks on the ceiling, interacting with the Marx Brothers.
filmography.plot: The Marx Brothers try to save a circus from bankruptcy and a crook who is trying to take it over.

filmography.title: Our Miss Brooks
filmography.role_description: The beloved, witty high school English teacher, reprising her famous radio and TV role for the big screen.
filmography.plot: Miss Brooks tries to land a job at a new school and snag the affections of the shy biology teacher, Mr. Boynton.

filmography.title: The Dark at the Top of the Stairs
filmography.role_description: The boisterous, talkative sister who masks her own unhappy marriage with humor.
filmography.plot: A harness salesman and his family face various personal crises in 1920s Oklahoma.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress (Shirley Knight)

filmography.title: Night and Day
filmography.role_description: A singer who performs Cole Porter's songs in this biographical musical.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized biography of composer Cole Porter, exploring his career and his relationship with his wife.

filmography.title: The Voice of the Turtle
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated, cynical actress who unintentionally brings the two romantic leads together.
filmography.plot: A soldier on leave in New York City falls for an aspiring actress after her friend stands him up.

filmography.title: Tea for Two
filmography.role_description: The skeptical friend and secretary to the heiress protagonist.
filmography.plot: An heiress must say 'no' to every question for 24 hours in order to win a bet and finance her boyfriend's show.

filmography.title: We're Not Married!
filmography.role_description: One half of a bored suburban couple who discovers their marriage license is invalid.
filmography.plot: Five couples discover that they are not legally married because the Justice of the Peace who wed them didn't have a valid license.

filmography.title: One Touch of Venus
filmography.role_description: The efficient, wisecracking secretary to a department store mogul.
filmography.plot: A window dresser kisses a statue of Venus, which comes to life and falls in love with him, causing chaos.

filmography.title: That Uncertain Feeling
filmography.role_description: The secretary to an insurance salesman whose wife seeks psychiatric help.
filmography.plot: A happily married woman sees a psychoanalyst for her hiccups and is advised to look for romance outside her marriage.

filmography.title: Comrade X
filmography.role_description: A reporter in Moscow who works alongside Clark Gable's character.
filmography.plot: An American reporter in Russia is forced to smuggle a streetcar conductor's daughter out of the country.

filmography.title: Manpower
filmography.role_description: A hostess at a clip joint who provides comic relief in this love triangle drama.
filmography.plot: Two power linemen fight over a woman they both love, leading to danger on the job.

filmography.title: Whistling in the Dark
filmography.role_description: The manager and girlfriend of a radio crime drama star.
filmography.plot: A radio crime show host is kidnapped by a cult leader and forced to devise a perfect murder.

filmography.title: The Kid from Brooklyn
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who helps a timid milkman turned boxer.
filmography.plot: A shy milkman accidentally knocks out a champion boxer and becomes a prizefighter.

filmography.title: My Reputation
filmography.role_description: The supportive and modern-thinking friend of a grieving widow.
filmography.plot: A widow is criticized by her children and friends when she starts dating an army officer too soon after her husband's death.

filmography.title: Goodbye, My Fancy
filmography.role_description: The secretary to a congresswoman who returns to her old college.
filmography.plot: A congresswoman returns to her alma mater to receive an honorary degree and rekindles a romance with the college president.

filmography.title: The Doughgirls
filmography.role_description: A Russian sniper visiting Washington D.C. who adds to the chaos in a crowded hotel suite.
filmography.plot: Newlyweds rush to Washington D.C. for a honeymoon but get entangled in a hotel room shortage and bureaucratic mix-ups.

filmography.title: Grease 2
filmography.role_description: Arden reprises her role as the high school principal in this musical sequel.
filmography.plot: A new English exchange student tries to win the heart of the leader of the Pink Ladies by becoming a cool biker.

filmography.title: Under the Rainbow
filmography.role_description: An eccentric royal visiting a hotel filled with little people casting for 'The Wizard of Oz'.
filmography.plot: A chaotic comedy set in a hotel where the Munchkins from The Wizard of Oz, a German spy, and a Japanese tourist group converge.

filmography.title: Three Husbands
filmography.role_description: A wife who receives a letter from a deceased bachelor claiming he had an affair with her.
filmography.plot: A bachelor leaves letters to three of his friends claiming he had an affair with one of their wives, causing chaos.

filmography.title: Paid in Full
filmography.role_description: A supportive friend to the two sisters at the center of the drama.
filmography.plot: A woman takes the blame for her sister's accidental killing of a child and later marries her sister's ex-husband.

filmography.title: Curtain Call at Cactus Creek
filmography.role_description: A member of a traveling theatrical troupe in the Wild West.
filmography.plot: A traveling actor is mistaken for a bank robber in the Old West.
